document.docAuthor: Bakker, Piet A. J. & Albano, Paolo G.
document.masterDocTitle: Nomenclator, geographic and stratigraphic distribution of the family Triphoridae (Mollusca: Gastropoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Nomenclator, geographic and stratigraphic distribution of the family Triphoridae (Mollusca: Gastropoda)

bibRefCitation.author: Faber, M. J. & Moolenbeek, R. G.
bibRefCitation.refString: Faber, M. J. & Moolenbeek, R. G. (1991) Two new shallow water triphorids and a new name in Metaxia from Florida and the West Indies. Apex, 6 (3 - 4), 81 - 85.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks.
Metaxia excelsa Faber & Moolenbeek, 1991
is introduced as a replacement for
Cerithium exile C.B. Adams, 1850
. Records of Odé (1989) and Tunnell ( et al. 2010) were misidentifications of
Cerithiopsis metaxae var. taeniolata Dall, 1889
(M.R. Fernandes pers.comm.).
